title: HEAL WITH DETOX
description: The book is based on using a Functional and Swiss Biological medicine approach to look at detoxification. It shares real patients' stories on how toxins can affect our body's system including our gut, brain, endocrine system, immune system and cardiovascular system. The book gives the reader an overview on what we can do to test for and help our body accelerate the detoxification process. The book also comes with detoxification recipes to help the reader to use nutrients to enhance the liver's detoxification process.
